articles.title: Finland To Become 31st Member Of Military Alliance NATO Today - NDTV
articles.description: Last year, the Kremlin's all-out invasion of Ukraine upended Europe's security landscape and prompted Finland -- and its neighbour Sweden -- to drop decades of non-alignment.
articles.content:
Brussels, Belgium: Finland becomes the 31st member of NATO on Tuesday, in a historic strategic shift provoked by Moscow's war on Ukraine, which doubles the US-led alliance's border with Russia.
Last… [+3859 chars]
